code:
```
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic areset,
    input logic [7:0] d,
    output logic [7:0] q
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (areset) begin
            q <= 8'b0;
        end else begin
            q <= d;
        end
    end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic areset,
    input logic [7:0] d,
    output logic [7:0] q
);

    always @(posedge clk or posedge areset) begin
        if (areset) begin
            q <= 8'b0;
        end else begin
            q <= d;
        end
    end

endmodule
